SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player in the game. It provides methods to place a card on the game field and to check if a card can be placed at a specific position on the game field. It also provides methods to retrieve the list of playable cards and the objective card of the player. Additionally, it stores the nickname, the score, the pawn, the resource holder, and the game field associated with the player.
See Also:

      Checks if a card can be placed at the specified position on the game field.
      Parameters:

      pos - The position on the game field where the card is to be placed.
      Returns:

    • placeAt

      Places a card on the game field at the specified position.
      Parameters:

      pos - The position on the game field where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      IllegalPlacementException - if the position is not valid
      IllegalGamePositionException

    • getPlacedCards

      public Map<GameFieldPosition,Side> getPlacedCards()
      This class represents a game field where cards can be placed and manipulated. It provides methods to check if a card can be placed at a specific position on the game field.
